title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in dataset, but expression builder still shows old column names
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the original column name is displayed below, but the alias name is displayed above as row['column1'] when double-clicking the original name.
EB: In the expression builder, when selecting the dataset and double-clicking the first column name, the alias name 'column1' should be displayed instead of the original name. According to scr 78193 in tracker, the first column in the expression builder should use the alias name.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Create a new datasource and dataset. 
2. Set the alias of the first column in the dataset to 'column1'. 
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 
4. Select the dataset in the expression builder and double-click the first column name.
